description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Kernel Denial of Service vulnerability (CVE-2024-26181):

1. Download and apply the relevant KB updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog based on your Windows version and build number:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854)
   - For Windows 10 (various versions): [KB5035858](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858), [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
This vulnerability could lead to a denial of service on affected systems. Apply the appropriate updates to mitigate this risk. Always backup important data before proceeding with updates.
